meanings.definition: A font of symbols and shapes used for decorative or symbolic purposes.
meanings.sent1: I printed the invitation in Wingdings to make it look fancy.
meanings.sent2: The Wingdings font has many unique characters to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The Wingdings on the poster made it hard to read, but it looked cool.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry box was like a treasure chest full of Wingdings waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The secret code was written in Wingdings, adding an air of mystery to the message.

meanings.definition: To use the Wingdings font in a document or design.
meanings.sent1: She decided to wingdings the title to make it stand out.
meanings.sent2: I always wingdings my presentations to make them more visually appealing.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally wingdings the entire report, causing confusion among his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The artist wingdings the logo, transforming it into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: In her project, she chose to wingdings the headings for a modern touch.
